body: Whenever I hold the tab key on multiplayer for an extended period of time, my screen starts flickering and it does this: (I'm on a mac, anyone care to help?)
body_tagged: Whenever I hold the tab key on multiplayer for an extended period of time, my screen starts flickering and it does this: (I'm on a mac, anyone care to help?)
title: Minecraft help... black text?

replies.body: Looks like a graphic error, do you ever clean out your computer? Try that maybe get all the dust out, if not i would bring it into a shop it looks like your graphics card.
replies.body_tagged: Looks like a graphic error, do you ever clean out your computer? Try that maybe get all the dust out, if not i would bring it into a shop it looks like your graphics card.

replies.body: If that only happens when he holds tab down for a long time it probably isn't his graphics card, as that probably would also affect other programs, but I'm no expert so don't quote me on this.
replies.body_tagged: If that only happens when he holds tab down for a long time it probably isn't his graphics card, as that probably would also affect other programs, but I'm no expert so don't quote me on this.

replies.body: This used to happen to me in older versions of minecraft with McPvP mod installed (I'm not a Mac user), but as mentioned before it looks like your graphics card :/
replies.body_tagged: This used to happen to me in older versions of minecraft with McPvP mod installed (I'm not a Mac user), but as mentioned before it looks like your graphics card :/

replies.body: This happened to me as well a while ago. What I did is changed my graphics card and it went back to being normal. I think that is the problem.
replies.body_tagged: This happened to me as well a while ago. What I did is changed my graphics card and it went back to being normal. I think that is the problem.

replies.body: pl0x hax 8/8 m/ plz nerf o_o
replies.body_tagged: pl0x hax 8/8 m/ plz nerf o_o

replies.body:
I used to get that with 1.6.4 Animated Player's mod + sortex pure pack.

Try removing your texture packs if you're using one.
replies.body_tagged:
I used to get that with 1.6.4 Animated Player's mod + sortex pure pack.

replies.body:
Go to a genius bar

Genius: O hai, can I help U
You: Oh yeah, my graphics are messed up when I play Minecraft
Genius: *under breath*: urgh minecrafters. Uh yeah lets run a diagnostics...
Genius: Oh yeah... Can't be fixed. By a new one...

That was like 35% of my experience of when i went to a genius bar...

replies.body:
if you ever get your laptop checked out never send it to a company where they sell their own computers... they are willing to squeeze your money out by making you buy a new one for something they can fix fast..



And for this subject, try taking your texture pack off, looks like you have one

replies.body: This happened to me Twice, it is an error with one of the compenents on my Mac, problem gets fixed by simply shutting and restarting your computer..   (lybll.jar)
